title: Using blockchain to monitor the COVID-19 vaccine supply chain
description: The COVID-19 vaccine might require cold storage. Here's how Blockchain can help all parties be sure that vaccine supplies are being stored and handled properly.
cleaned_text: the COVID-19 vaccine supply chain Blockchain could play an essential role in the distribution of the COVID-19 vaccine.
